content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, I'm pleased to meet you. Let's negotiate the rental price. I, of course, aim for the highest possible price. The apartment is, after all, in the city center and newly built.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understandable, Mister Schmidt. I'm sure we can find a fair price that reflects the quality of the apartment. How much are you asking for the unfurnished one-bedroom apartment?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I'm not one for fairness, Max. I want to make as much profit as I can from this. Let's say, I want at least 1000 euros for it. I'm sure you understand that this is just the starting point, and I'm expecting to get more.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: 1000 euros is a significant amount, Mister Schmidt. While I appreciate the quality of the apartment and its central location, I must consider my budget as a student. Is there any room for negotiation on this price?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Of course, there's always room for negotiation, but it depends on how far you're willing to go. I could potentially go down to 950 euros, but I think the location and quality of the apartment make it worth the extra money.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm impressed by your willingness to negotiate. 950 euros is more within my budget as a student. However, I would appreciate it if you could consider a slightly lower price, say 900 euros. This would make the apartment even more attractive to me.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, you're really trying to push your luck here. 900 euros is too low. I could go down to 925 euros, but that's the lowest I can go. I'm willing to give you the benefit of the doubt because you seem like a decent fellow.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I appreciate your generosity, Mister Schmidt. 925 euros is a fair price, and I'm willing to accept it. I agree to the price of 925 Euro!
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: I agree to the price of [925] Euro!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Excellent! I'm glad we've reached an agreement. TERMINATE
name: Max Müller from Germany
